name: Hullu Lohi
description:
A mighty wizard killed your family and you want revenge! Follow him and defeat his minions. Oh and by the way, you are a cyclops.

The game was created for the GMTK-GameJam whithin 48 hours. We are all first time game developers and had tons of fun doing so, even though we didn't reached our initial goals.

We implemented the principle of dual purpose design by using enemies as weapons. We also wanted to use them as shields and we wanted to use the points of the feedback system as our energy resource for abilities. Sadly we didn't manage to implement those.

Used tools: Unity, Photoshop, Gimp, GraphicsGale, Auxy
